extendedInfo.description: Just Another Minimal ThemeFlat BlackThis is a very minimal black mod of the statusbar and notification drawer. It is based on my initial JAMT theme with icons updated for a more unified look. This free version provides modifications only to the statusbar so other applications can still customised as the user wants.For more thorough theming check the paid version.It features;*MDPI and HDPI support*Smooth sync animations*Smooth battery animations*100% Original icons*Black statusbar*Battery Percentage in statusbar (Donate Only)*New SpinnersOther apps with status icons themed*Calendar*Alarm Clock*Email*Gmail*Music*FM Radio*MMS/SMS*Market*Media Uploader*Torch*Facebook*Twitter*Drocap2*Pulse*Plume*Tweetdeck*WidgetlockerIf you have any suggestions of other apps which you would like a status icon of send me a tweet!The lock screen, USB debugging notification and some system dialogs cannot be themed in the T-Mobile Theme Engine, therefore they will remain unchanged. Disable USB debugging notification to improve the look of this theme. InstructionsDownload the theme, go to the theme chooser app. Select "JAMT-Flat Black-Free" & apply. Reboot your phone.Enjoy the your new minimalistic phone!If you have any questions or issues please contact me through twitter (@_classicalgas) on XDA (classicalgas) or at my blog (themedroid.com).To get the screen looking as it does in the screenshot please go here (http://goo.gl/fSFaH) Special thanks goes to; CyanogenMOD, Haxzamatic, JazzK, Sonny Sekhon, R3D, nhnt11 and all others who have supported my work!CyanogenMOD, Cyanogen Theme, CM7, T-Mobile, Theme, Engine, JAMT, Black, Flat, Minimal

reviews.comment: My favourite of the b/w minimalist themes... it\'s beautiful and works flawlessly. If only the highlight color were white it would perfect. 5 stars!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice and simple but...
reviews.comment: I would like to see a white battery indicator when using numbers and a white overscroll glow. The green and orange for those features look terrible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Minimalistic Theme
reviews.comment: It\'s called \"Just Another Minimalistic Theme\" for a reason. Only the status bar and notifications are skinned. Read the description. And the theme pictured on the screenshots is a Windows Phone 7-based theme.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is great
reviews.comment: This is a full theme and everything looks professional and congruent. Great job. Thanks.

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: Is a very normal clean theme. The only problem is it doesn\'t support the battery bar on your status bar. So the battery bar defaults back to normal. Green. The battery bar is green while everything else is white. Doesn\'t flow with the theme very well.
